title: Foundations of Python Programming for Earth Science Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in earth science, basic computer application skills
context.additional_context: Graduate-level social studies curriculum for office/administrative professionals. Requires personalized progression based on individual learning pace.

learning_goals: Learners can write climate-related data processing code using basic Python syntax (variables, control statements, functions) required for earth science data analysis.
Learners can visualize and analyze time-series data using widely used packages in earth science (pandas, numpy, matplotlib).
Learners can design Python projects aligned with individual research topics based on a constructivist approach and solve problems independently.

resources: Earth Science Case-Based Practical Problem Set

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
